gemini_config.system_instruction: Design a 'Sponsor Hall of Fame' section for my README and Sponsors page that creatively showcases and thanks all contributors at different tiers.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Design a 'Sponsor Hall of Fame' section for my README and Sponsors page that creatively showcases an..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
